snippet.title: Streets of Rage 3 [USA] (Sega Genesis) - (Longplay - Axel Stone | Hard | Good Ending Path)
snippet.description:
Game Title: Streets of Rage 3
Version: USA
Developer: Sega
Publisher: Sega
North American Title: Streets of Rage 3
European Title: Streets of Rage 3
Japanese Title: Bare Knuckle III
Language: English
Platform: Sega Genesis
Character: Axel Stone
Difficulty: Hard
Ending Path: Good

Played, Recorded and Edited by: TurkishBullet19


Hello everyone and Welcome to my YouTube Channel!

In this Longplay/Walkthrough video, i'm playing and showing a thorough and detailed guide about how to complete the Sega Genesis version of Streets of Rage 3 [USA] by playing as Axel Stone on the Hard difficulty setting.

Features:

-No Damage
-No Death
-No Continues
-Good Ending

My purpose in this Longplay/Walkthrough video is to thoroughly entertain and also to provide a thorough, detailed and Complete Guide so that it can help the Audience out when they are stuck in a specific area/part of the game.

Thank you very much for taking your time to watch my Longplay/Walkthrough video. I truly appreciate that!
